originalTitle: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
title: What a seventh term for 81-year-old leader means for Uganda
content: Yoweri Museveni has won a record seventh term in elections after promising that the fledgling oil sector will boost the economy.

originalTitle: I want to show the world what Africa is - YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
title: I want to show the world what Africa is - YouTube star brings joy and tears on tour
content: "I love the love in Africa. The energy here is crazy," he says on his maiden tour of the continent.

originalTitle: Ugandan leader extends 40-year rule after winning contested poll
title: Ugandan leader extends 40-year rule after winning contested poll
content: President Yoweri Museveni wins a seventh term, as his main rival Bobi Wine decries "fake results".

originalTitle: Syrian army advances on SDF stronghold of Raqqa: What’s the latest?
title: Syrian army advances on SDF stronghold of Raqqa: What’s the latest?
content: Military takes control of Tabqa in Raqqa governorate, and President al-Sharaa signs a decree recognising Kurdish rights.

originalTitle: Syria’s al-Sharaa restores citizenship and language rights to Syrian Kurds
title: Syria’s al-Sharaa restores citizenship and language rights to Syrian Kurds
content: Syria's Ahmed al-Sharaa has signed a decree formally restoring citizenship and language rights to Syrian Kurds.

originalTitle: Italy’s PM Meloni calls Trump’s Greenland tariffs on Europe a mistake
title: Italy’s PM Meloni calls Trump’s Greenland tariffs on Europe a mistake
content: Italy’s PM Giorgia Meloni has criticised US President Donald Trump’s pledge to impose tariffs on European countries.

originalTitle: Trump tariff threat over Greenland 'unacceptable', European leaders say
title: Trump tariff threat over Greenland 'unacceptable', European leaders say
content: The US president says several European allies opposed to his plans to buy Greenland will face 10% tariffs from February.

originalTitle: Fears Iran's internet shutdown could lead to 'extreme digital isolation'
title: Fears Iran's internet shutdown could lead to 'extreme digital isolation'
content: Internet monitor FilterWatch warns that authorities are trying to cut the country off from international connectivity.

originalTitle: Syrian army seizes country's largest oil field from Kurdish forces
title: Syrian army seizes country's largest oil field from Kurdish forces
content: The Kurdish-led SDF militia withdrew from the Omar oil field amid an eastward push by government forces.

originalTitle: Spurs chiefs consider sacking Frank as fans turn
title: Spurs chiefs consider sacking Frank as fans turn
content: Tottenham head coach Thomas Frank is under significant internal scrutiny with the club considering calling time on his seven-month reign.

originalTitle: 'No-one says anything in your face' - Martinez hits back at Scholes and Butt
title: 'No-one says anything in your face' - Martinez hits back at Scholes and Butt
content: Pundits discussing Man Utd "can talk on the television" but "no-one says anything" to your face, according to defender Lisandro Martinez.

originalTitle: Missed opportunity for Arsenal - but were they denied 'clear penalty'?
title: Missed opportunity for Arsenal - but were they denied 'clear penalty'?
content: Arsenal have moved seven points clear at the top of the Premier League after a 0-0 draw at Nottingham Forest - but should the Gunners have been awarded a penalty?
